  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutSVGResourceLinearGradient {linearGradient} [id="Gradient"] [gradientUnits=userSpaceOnUse] [stops=( #FF0000@0.00 #FF0000@1.00 )] [start=(0,0)] [end=(800,0)]

    LayoutSVGText {text} at (0,0) size 0x0
